body_html: For what matters, I will modify this PR to include a function which is fail-safe for the use cases I can come up with. But still, I would expect at least get_root_dir_with_all_resources to find the runfiles directory. Maybe I can figure out why this method fails for me and fix it instead.

body: For what matters, I will modify this PR to include a function which is fail-safe for the use cases I can come up with. But still, I would expect at least `get_root_dir_with_all_resources` to find the `runfiles` directory. Maybe I can figure out why this method fails for me and fix it instead.
